name: Maliss <C> MTP-07
text: You can activate this card the turn it was Set, by banishing 1 face-up "Maliss" monster you control. Add 1 "Maliss" monster from your Deck to your hand, then, if you control a "Maliss" Link Monster, you can banish 1 card on the field. You can only activate 1 "Maliss <C> MTP-07" per turn.
